name: Cognac Show
subject: Cognac Show
body:
Thank you for submitting your forms for The Whisky Exchange Event Cognac Show.

Your forms have been received and will now be reviewed by a member of the team. Should any details be incorrect or require further evidence, we will reassign the corresponding form(s) to you for more information as required.

If at any time the information supplied should change (brand name, SKUs being showcased, attendee, etc.), please contact a member of the events team who can assist you.

If you have any questions about the show, then please contact us.

Best regards,

Cognac Show Team
